overview:
As president, Brian manages the firm’s operations, sales, finances, and technology infrastructure.

He is responsible for developing and executing the strategic plan, building an effective management team, ensuring that our client satisfaction levels reflect our best efforts, and ensuring that our core values are reflected in everything we do.

Brian previously held executive-level positions at PricewaterhouseCoopers, PictureVision (a subsidiary of Kodak) and The Hamilton Securities Group.

Brian is a CPA. He holds an undergraduate degree from Virginia Tech, and an MBA from Virginia Commonwealth University.
